shoppingCart.model

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • shoppingCart.model.ProductList
      • shoppingCart.model.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Product>

    public class Inventory
extends ProductList
    A ProductList that manages the Products in the Seller's inventory and the seller's financial state. ConcreteAggregate in Iterator Pattern Singleton in Singleton Pattern
    Author:
    Seth Moore, Newman Souza
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Product product)
      Adds a copy (including quantity) of the supplied Product to the ProductList, and increases costs by the invoicePrice times quantity of the Product.
      void clear()
      Removes all the Products in Inventory, and sets costs and revenues to 0.00
      void decrement(Product product)
      Decrements, by one, the quantity of a Product that equals the supplied Product, and increases revenues by the Product's sellPrice.
      java.math.BigDecimal getCosts()
      Accessor method for costs
      static Inventory getInstance()
      The accessor method for obtaining the single (there can only be one) instance of Inventory.
      int getNewID()
      Creates and returns a new integer that is equal to p.getID()+1, where p is the Product in Inventory with greatest ID.
      java.math.BigDecimal getProfits()
      Calculates and returns the seller's profits, based on revenues - costs
      java.math.BigDecimal getRevenues()
      Accessor method for revenues
      void increment(Product product)
      Increments, by one, the quantity of a Product that equals the supplied Product, and decreases revenues by the Product's sellPrice.
      void update(Product product)
      Updates all the fields of the product in Inventory whose ID matches the ID of product to match the fields in product.

        the seller's profits

      • decrement

        public void decrement(Product product)
        Decrements, by one, the quantity of a Product that equals the supplied Product, and increases revenues by the Product's sellPrice.
        Overrides:
        decrement in class ProductList
        Parameters:
        product - the Product whose matching Product will be incremented.
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product).getQuantity() > 0

      • increment

        public void increment(Product product)
        Increments, by one, the quantity of a Product that equals the supplied Product, and decreases revenues by the Product's sellPrice.
        Overrides:
        increment in class ProductList
        Parameters:
        product - the Product whose matching Product will be decremented.
        Precondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product) != null, getMatchingProduct(product).getQuantity() > 0
        Postcondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product).getQuantity() >= 0

      • getNewID

        public int getNewID()
        Creates and returns a new integer that is equal to p.getID()+1, where p is the Product in Inventory with greatest ID.
        Returns:
        the largest ID in the inventory plus 1.

      • add

        public void add(Product product)
        Adds a copy (including quantity) of the supplied Product to the ProductList, and increases costs by the invoicePrice times quantity of the Product.
        Overrides:
        add in class ProductList
        Parameters:
        product - the Product whose copy will be added to this ProductList
        Precondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product) == null
        Postcondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product).equals(product) == true, getMatchingProduct(product).getQuantity() == product.getQuantity()

      • update

        public void update(Product product)
        Updates all the fields of the product in Inventory whose ID matches the ID of product to match the fields in product. If product's quantity is greater than the quantity of the match, costs is increased by the difference times the InvoicePrice of product.
        Parameters:
        product - the Product whose match will be found and updated
        Precondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product) != null

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all the Products in Inventory, and sets costs and revenues to 0.00
        Overrides:
        clear in class ProductList
        Postcondition:
        iterater().hasNext == false, getCosts().equals(new BigDecimal("0.00"), getRevenues().equals(new BigDecimal("0.00")
